thread.title: Pitchfork Presents Run the Jewels October Kickoff Show
thread.title_full: Pitchfork Presents Run the Jewels October Kickoff Show

author: Pitchfork
title: Pitchfork Presents Run the Jewels October Kickoff Show
text:
Pitchfork Presents Run the Jewels October Kickoff Show Celebrating the launch of the new beer and culture website Run the Jewels 
Run the Jewels will perform at a kickoff concert presented by Pitchfork in celebration of the launch of October , a new beer and culture website. The show will take place on March 14 at 8 p.m. at the Fillmore in Charlotte, North Carolina. Tickets are on sale now; find them here . 
Run the Jewels have partnered with Interboro Brewing (run by former Def Jux manager Jesse Ferguson) to bring concertgoers a beer brewed specifically for their current tour. It’s a North East style IPA with citra and mosaic hops called “Stay Gold,” named after a track from the hip-hop duo’s latest album RTJ3 . 
October is a creation from Slow Focus, Pitchfork's creative studio. 
Check out Run the Jewels’ full set from Pitchfork Music Festival Paris: Artists In This Story
